org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments

Class EasyInstallExternalEnvironmentInstaller<T extends ExternalEnvironment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments.ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments.EasyInstallExternalEnvironmentInstaller<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, JIPipeRunnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellposeEasyInstaller, OmniposeEasyInstaller, PythonEasyInstaller, REasyInstaller

    public abstract class EasyInstallExternalEnvironmentInstaller<T extends ExternalEnvironment>
extends ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
    Environment installer that extracts a premade package of the environment and generates the appropriate environment Supported are .tar.gz and .zip archives that should contain the hierarchy of files as expected in the environment installation directory. The run() method will ensure that
